trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around January 20th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile at local shopping area I dropped my brother off at a local store. while there I saw a man walk out of a store and point up to the sky. I noticed a diamond shape moving slowly in from the Columbian River. This object stopped moving over an area near Mill Plain Bld and freeway 205. Object stayed hovered or tethered in the same spot for approximatly 15 min. My Brother and I left the store and drove to get underneith this object and got about a block away were we stopped to get gas. This object was in sight up to walking in to pay for the gas. 20 seconds later while walking back to truck to track this object I noticed it was gone. I first thought this was a tethered blimp or balloon. Thinking this was a simple thing to find out I started looking for a tether of some sort
Summary: diamond shape moved in slowly over vancouver and hovered for 15 min or so
